remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法和属性类公开通过内部由 ASP.NET 提供的对象。The methods and properties of the class are exposed through the intrinsic object provided by ASP.NET. ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目的源代码是可随附于本主题：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192870)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192870). 下面的示例演示如何使用方法和方法的类。The following example demonstrates how to use the method and the method of the class. 方法有助于确保用户提供的任何字符串输入将呈现为静态文本，而不是可执行脚本或 HTML 元素的浏览器中。The method helps ensure that any user-supplied string input will be rendered as static text in browsers instead of executable script or HTML elements. 方法对 Url 进行编码，以便它们正确传输 HTTP 流中。The method encodes URLs so that they are correctly transmitted in the HTTP stream. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的新页的执行完成后继续执行原始页。The method continues execution of the original page after execution of the new page is completed. 方法无条件地将执行转移到另一个处理程序。The method unconditionally transfers execution to another handler. ASP.NET 不会验证当前用户有权查看由提供的资源方法。ASP.NET does not verify that the current user is authorized to view the resource delivered by the method. 尽管 ASP.NET 授权和身份验证逻辑运行于调用原始资源处理程序之前，ASP.NET 将直接调用所指示的处理程序方法并不重新身份验证和授权逻辑运行的新资源。Although the ASP.NET authorization and authentication logic runs before the original resource handler is called, ASP.NET directly calls the handler indicated by the method and does not rerun authentication and authorization logic for the new resource. 如果应用程序的安全策略要求客户端具有适当的授权才能访问资源，应用程序应强制重新授权，或提供自定义访问控制机制。If your application's security policy requires clients to have appropriate authorization to access the resource, the application should force reauthorization or provide a custom access-control mechanism. 可以使用强制重新授权方法而不是方法。You can force reauthorization by using the method instead of the method. 执行在其中浏览器请求新的资源的客户端的重定向。 performs a client-side redirect in which the browser requests the new resource. 由于此重定向是新的请求进入系统，它被受制于 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 和 ASP.NET 安全策略的所有身份验证和授权逻辑。Because this redirect is a new request entering the system, it is subjected to all the authentication and authorization logic of both Internet Information Services (IIS) and ASP.NET security policy. 你可以验证用户有权通过结合使用的自定义授权方法查看资源方法之前的应用程序调用方法。You can verify that the user has permission to view the resource by incorporating a custom authorization method that uses the method before the application calls the method. ## Examples 下面的示例显示当前目录中的.aspx 页""。The following example displays the .aspx page "Updateinfo.aspx" in the current directory. 显示 Updateinfo.aspx 页后，程序执行将返回到起始页。Program execution returns to the starting page after the Updateinfo.aspx page is displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以编写自定义 HTTP 处理程序来处理特定的预定义任何的类型语言都是符合公共语言规范 (CLS) 中的 HTTP 请求。You can write custom HTTP handlers to process specific, predefined types of HTTP requests in any language that is compliant with the Common Language Specification (CLS). 而不是传统的 ASP (也称为经典 ASP) 页或 ASP.NET 页的 HTTP 处理程序类中定义的可执行代码对这些特定请求做出响应。Executable code that is defined in the HTTP handler classes instead of conventional ASP (also known as classic ASP) pages or ASP.NET pages responds to these specific requests. HTTP 处理程序允许与的低级别的请求和响应服务正在运行 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) Web 服务器进行交互和它们提供类似的功能于 ISAPI 扩展，但有一个更简单的编程模型。HTTP handlers allow for interacting with the low-level request and response services of a Web server that is running Internet Information Services (IIS), and they provide functionality that is similar to ISAPI extensions but with a simpler programming model. ASP.NET 不会验证当前用户有权查看的资源，则由传送方法。ASP.NET does not verify that the current user is authorized to view the resource that is delivered by the method. 尽管 ASP.NET 授权和身份验证逻辑运行于调用原始资源处理程序之前，ASP.NET 将直接调用的处理程序将由方法并不重新运行用于身份验证和授权逻辑新资源。Although the ASP.NET authorization and authentication logic runs before the original resource handler is called, ASP.NET directly calls the handler that is indicated by the method and does not rerun authentication and authorization logic for the new resource. 如果你的应用程序的安全策略要求客户端具有适当的授权才能获得访问资源的权限，应用程序应强制重新授权或提供自定义访问控制机制。If the security policy for your application requires clients to have appropriate authorization to gain access to the resource, the application should force reauthorization or provide a custom access-control mechanism. 可以使用强制重新授权方法而不是方法。You can force reauthorization by using the method instead of the method. 执行在其中浏览器请求新的资源的客户端的重定向。The performs a client-side redirect in which the browser requests the new resource. 由于此重定向是新的请求进入系统，它会对进行了 IIS 和 ASP.NET 的安全策略的所有身份验证和授权逻辑。Because this redirect is a new request entering the system, it is subjected to all the authentication and authorization logic of both the IIS and ASP.NET security policy. 你可以验证用户有权通过结合使用的自定义授权方法查看资源方法之前的应用程序调用方法。You can verify that the user has permission to view the resource by incorporating a custom authorization method that uses the method before the application calls the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 编码可确保文本是在浏览器中正确显示，不会被解释为 html 格式浏览器。HTML encoding makes sure that text is displayed correctly in the browser and not interpreted by the browser as HTML. 例如，如果文本字符串包含小于号 (\<) 或更高版本浏览器不是号 (>)，会将这些字符解释为左或右括号之间的 HTML 标记。For example, if a text string contains a less than sign (\<) or greater than sign (>), the browser would interpret these characters as the opening or closing bracket of an HTML tag. ASP.NET 不会验证当前用户有权查看由提供的资源方法。ASP.NET does not verify that the current user is authorized to view the resource delivered by the method. 尽管 ASP.NET 授权和身份验证逻辑运行于调用原始资源处理程序之前，ASP.NET 将直接调用所指示的处理程序方法并不重新身份验证和授权逻辑运行的新资源。Although the ASP.NET authorization and authentication logic runs before the original resource handler is called, ASP.NET directly calls the handler indicated by the method and does not rerun authentication and authorization logic for the new resource. 如果应用程序的安全策略要求客户端具有适当的授权才能访问资源，应用程序应强制重新授权，或提供自定义访问控制机制。If your application's security policy requires clients to have appropriate authorization to access the resource, the application should force reauthorization or provide a custom access-control mechanism. 可以使用强制重新授权方法而不是方法。You can force reauthorization by using the method instead of the method. 方法执行在其中浏览器请求新的资源的客户端的重定向。The method performs a client-side redirect in which the browser requests the new resource. 由于此重定向是新的请求进入系统，它被受制于 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 和 ASP.NET 安全策略的所有身份验证和授权逻辑。Because this redirect is a new request entering the system, it is subjected to all the authentication and authorization logic of both Internet Information Services (IIS) and ASP.NET security policy. 你可以验证用户有权通过结合使用的自定义授权方法查看资源方法之前的应用程序调用方法。You can verify that the user has permission to view the resource by incorporating a custom authorization method that uses the method before the application calls the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以编写自定义 HTTP 处理程序来处理特定的预定义任何的类型语言都是符合公共语言规范 (CLS) 中的 HTTP 请求。You can write custom HTTP handlers to process specific, predefined types of HTTP requests in any language that is compliant with the Common Language Specification (CLS). 而不是传统的 ASP (也称为经典 ASP) 页或 ASP.NET 页的 HTTP 处理程序类中定义的可执行代码对这些特定请求做出响应。Executable code that is defined in the HTTP handler classes instead of conventional ASP (also known as classic ASP) pages or ASP.NET pages responds to these specific requests. HTTP 处理程序允许与的低级别的请求和响应服务正在运行 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) Web 服务器进行交互和它们提供类似的功能于 ISAPI 扩展，但有一个更简单的编程模型。HTTP handlers allow for interacting with the low-level request and response services of a Web server that is running Internet Information Services (IIS), and they provide functionality that is similar to ISAPI extensions but with a simpler programming model. 如果您设置`preserveForm`参数`true`，目标页将能够通过使用访问前一页的视图状态属性。If you set the `preserveForm` parameter to `true`, the target page will be able to access the view state of the previous page by using the property. 出于安全目的，您应保留`enableViewStateMac`属性设置为`true`。For security purposes, you should keep the `enableViewStateMac` attribute set to `true`. ASP.NET 不会验证当前用户有权查看由提供的资源方法。ASP.NET does not verify that the current user is authorized to view the resource delivered by the method. 尽管 ASP.NET 授权和身份验证逻辑运行于调用原始资源处理程序之前，ASP.NET 将直接调用所指示的处理程序方法，并为新的重新运行任务序列执行身份验证和授权逻辑资源。Although the ASP.NET authorization and authentication logic runs before the original resource handler is called, ASP.NET directly calls the handler indicated by the method, and does not rerun authentication and authorization logic for the new resource. 如果你的应用程序的安全策略要求客户端具有适当的授权才能访问资源，应用程序应强制重新授权或提供自定义访问控制机制。If the security policy for your application requires clients to have appropriate authorization to access the resource, the application should force reauthorization or provide a custom access-control mechanism. 可以使用强制重新授权方法而不是方法。You can force reauthorization by using the method instead of the method. 方法执行在其中浏览器请求新的资源的客户端的重定向。The method performs a client-side redirect in which the browser requests the new resource. 由于此重定向是新的请求进入系统，它会对进行了 IIS 和 ASP.NET 的安全策略的所有身份验证和授权逻辑。Because this redirect is a new request entering the system, it is subjected to all the authentication and authorization logic of both the IIS and ASP.NET security policy. 你可以验证用户有权通过结合使用的自定义授权方法查看资源方法之前的应用程序调用方法。You can verify that the user has permission to view the resource by incorporating a custom authorization method that uses the method before the application calls the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中的集成的管道模式运行时使用此方法[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]以允许请求处理，以从一个资源类型传输到另一个执行目标请求与正确的请求上下文。This method is used when running with the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to allow request processing to be transferred from one resource type to another while executing the target request with the correct request context. 例如，可以使用方法传输到 XML 页的请求的 ASPX 页的请求。For example, you can use the method to transfer a request for an ASPX page to a request for an XML page. 方法执行异步子执行指定的 url 与以下条件：The method performs an asynchronous child execution of the specified URL with the following conditions: - 如果`path`参数指定的查询字符串，它将用作新的查询字符串。If the `path` parameter specifies a query string, it will be used as the new query string. 如果包括任何查询字符串，不则该请求的查询字符串将重新使用。If no query string is included, the query string of the request will be re-used. - 如果`method`指定参数，将使用它。If the `method` parameter is specified, it will be used. 如果它是`null`，将使用原始请求的 HTTP 方法。If it is `null`, the HTTP method of the original request will be used. - 如果`preserveForm`参数是`true`，当前的实体正文的请求将可供目标请求。If the `preserveForm` parameter is `true`, the current entity body of the request will be available to the target request. 这使窗体发布，并将上传要在传输。This allows form posts and uploads to be transferred. - 如果对原始请求当前设置的用户标识，标识将传输到新的请求。If the user identity is currently set on the original request, the identity will be transferred to the new request. 这样，经过身份验证的请求重复使用的身份验证的新请求的结果。This allows authenticated requests to re-use the result of the authentication for the new request. 如果不希望要传输的用户，将用户设置为`null`传输之前对原始请求。If you do not want the user to be transferred, set the user to `null` on the original request before transferring. - 如果`headers`指定参数时，新的请求将执行的指定标头。If the `headers` parameter is specified, the new request will execute with the specified headers. 这可用于修改请求标头和 cookie 用于新请求，或添加特殊的标头，指定原始请求的接收位置。This can be used to modify the request headers and cookies for the new request, or add a special header that specifies where the original request was received. 此方法调用方法的重载`preserveUser`参数设置为`true`。This method calls the method overload with the `preserveUser` parameter set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks URL 编码可确保所有浏览器会将 URL 字符串中的文本正确传输。URL encoding ensures that all browsers will correctly transmit text in URL strings. 字符，如问题标记 （？）、 & 号 (&)、 斜杠标记 （/） 和空格可能会截断或某些浏览器已损坏。Characters such as a question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash mark (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers. 因此，这些字符必须以编码``标记或在查询字符串的字符串可以重新发送请求字符串中的浏览器。As a result, these characters must be encoded in `` tags or in query strings where the strings can be re-sent by a browser in a request string. 此方法是方便地访问方法在运行时从 ASP.NET 应用程序。This method is a convenient way to access the method at run time from an ASP.NET application. 在内部，此方法使用来对字符串进行解码。Internally, this method uses to decode strings. 在代码隐藏文件中的 ASP.NET web 页，访问的实例类通过`Server`属性。In the code-behind file for an ASP.NET web page, access an instance of the class through the `Server` property. 在不是代码隐藏文件中的类，使用`HttpContext.Current.Server`若要访问的实例类。In a class that is not in a code-behind file, use `HttpContext.Current.Server` to access an instance of the class. 在 web 应用程序，外部使用类进行编码或解码的值。Outside of a web application, use the class to encode or decode values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何对值进行 URL 解码，从查询字符串检索。The following example shows how to URL-decode a value that is retrieved from the query string. 代码驻留在 web 页的代码隐藏文件。The code resides in the code-behind file for a web page. `ReturnPage` 是指`HyperLink`控件。`ReturnPage` refers to a `HyperLink` control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlDecode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.httpserverutility.urldecode/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlDecode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.httpserverutility.urldecode/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] 下一个示例是上一个示例类似，但它显示的是如何到进行 URL 解码值从类中的不是在代码隐藏文件中。The next example is similar to the previous example except it shows how to URL-decode a value from within a class that is not in the code-behind file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlDecode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.httpserverutility.urldecode/cs/sampleclass.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlDecode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.httpserverutility.urldecode/vb/sampleclass.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks URL 编码可确保所有浏览器会将 URL 字符串中的文本正确传输。URL encoding ensures that all browsers will correctly transmit text in URL strings. 字符，如问题标记 （？）、 & 号 (&)、 斜杠标记 （/） 和空格可能会截断或某些浏览器已损坏。Characters such as a question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash mark (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers. 因此，这些字符必须以编码``标记或在查询字符串的字符串可以重新发送请求字符串中的浏览器。As a result, these characters must be encoded in `` tags or in query strings where the strings can be re-sent by a browser in a request string. 为方便地访问方法在运行时从 ASP.NET 应用程序。 is a convenient way to access the method at run time from an ASP.NET application. 在内部，使用对字符串进行编码。Internally, uses to encode strings. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class. ## Examples 下面的示例将编码用于通过 HTTP 传输的字符串。The following example encodes a string for transmission by HTTP. 它对名为的字符串进行编码`TestString`，其中包含文本"这是\<测试字符串 >。"，并将其复制到名为的字符串`EncodedString`为"此 + 是 + + %3ctest + 字符串 %3e。"。It encodes the string named `TestString`, which contains the text "This is a \.", and copies it into the string named `EncodedString` as "This+is+a+%3cTest+String%3e.". [!code-csharp[Classic HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 URL 字符串标记，它将二进制数据编码为 base 64 数字，转换为其等效的字节数组表示形式。The method converts a URL string token, which encodes binary data as base 64 digits, to its equivalent byte array representation. 使用方法以解码令牌在 URL 中传输和编码使用。Use the method to decode tokens transmitted on the URL and encoded by using the . 方法将返回一个空字节数组，如果`input`参数的长度为小于一。The method will return an empty byte array if the `input` parameter has a length of less than one.
